name: PLEXPLORE
description:
Have you ever wondered what it would be like to steal someone's ice cream, outsmart a high-tech alien, or nearly burn to death? Well you can answer all three of those questions in PLEXPLORE!

PLEXPLORE is a 22,888 kb large game in which you must steal ice cream from the intergalactic aliens: Tucker, Herbert, Wilson, Bennett, and Maxwell. They have the ability to read your mind, so don't think they don't know what your plotting.

Your journey will take place on the planet "Mowlar." Possibly named for it's shape, but that's just a rumor. Mowlar is one of the hottest planets in the universe, so you have been sent with heat-resistant gear to survive. It is also the only planet in it's solar system, if you don't count the moon or the sun that is.

Controls:
Jump - Space
jUmP iNfInItElY - sPaCe InFiNiTe TiMeS
Walk - WSAD/Arrow Keys
Look Around - Mouse

I hope you enjoy your three-dimensional space experience. Please consider that this is my first 3d game ever created, so it might not be very good.
